name: A little turtle has just hatched on a beach in Texas.
name_original: A little turtle has just hatched on a beach in Texas.
description:
Why Plastic Is a Problem for Sea Turtles

More than half the world's sea turtles have eaten plastic

Kemp's ridley sea turtles are the most endangered type of sea turtle in the world. Learn more about the Turtle Patrol. 

Created with Bitsy Game maker from Adam LeDoux and Borksy game hacks from ayolland.

Thanks for playing, and please recycle!
